oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Thank You Form Letter
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: civil rights; protests; Holloman, Frank; Memphis Police Department;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A form letter used by Holloman to thank those individuals who had offered their support. This example is addressed to Mrs. M.F. Miller; un-addressed copies also available in the collection.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Holloman, Frank
